summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3007, for the improvement of North 71st Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Dayton Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, by constructing wooden curbs and gutters; by the construction of concrete sidewalks, together with the necessary cross walks and by providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 36196 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
